Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 4 Saññojanagocchaka » 4.3 Saññojanasampayuttaduka » 4.3.1 Paṭiccavāra » 4.3.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 4.3.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Saññojanagocchaka
Saññojanasampayuttaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
46.
1437Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cha, samanantare cha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cha, purejāte cha, āsevane cha, kamme nava, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte cha, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cha, vigate cha, avigate nava.
1438Anulomaṃ.
